S.FORM: Danny Aiello kawas tay 1933, ryax sa tay 20 nqu tay 6, Danny Aiello, squliq na Bunge'. qnxan na raral Danny Aiello ga te magal laqi ru htgan beh West 68th Street, Manhattan( 68 ).hiya yaba ru yaya gzyaw qaya pincyogan nya.cingay kawas lga,Aiello ini smoya hiya yaba.suruw lga,1993 kawas psblaq sazing nha la. Aiello cyux Itali lamu,hiya 7 kawas,musa maki South Bronx,mqwas beh James Monroe pqwasan biru. 16 kawas, Aiello kbrus kawas nya,hetay pincyogan.maki hetay pincyogan cyugal kawas,suruw lga,musa New York rogal,cingay zyaw mlaghang nya. 1960 kawas,Aiello ga te 1202 mrhuw maki Amalgamated Transit Unionna Greyhound Bus pincyogan nya.hiya mlahang The Improv hlahuy maki New York. 1980 kawas,hiya smoya musa Caf√© Central,krryax na llpyung,cingay squilq musa uzi, maki 79th Street ru Amsterdam Avenue, in Manhattan( 79 ) ru Columbus nniqan maki 66th Street ru Columbus Avenue( 66 ). pincyogan nya 1970 kawas, Aiello te qutux tmwang ega'.raral ga,hiya ru Robert De Niro msqun mhtuw 1973 kawas Bang the Drum Slowly . 1974 kawas,Aiello mtbah squilq psibay mhtuw Tony Rosato. 1980 kawas,Aiello ru Jan Michael Vincen msqun mhtuw maki Defiance. 1981 kawas,Aiello mhtuw ABC Family of Strangers wal magal blaq sqabu. 1984 kawas,Aiello txali ru Jan Michael Vincen mhtuw Sergio Leone mkinsat mrhuw,lalu Aiello uzi. hngyang qwas qwas nya ga mhtuw beh ega',laqi ga syungaw yaba nya mzyugi ru mqwas. qyanux nya bsyaq bsyaq balay mqyanux Ramsey, New Jersey qani.musa maki binah Saddle River, New Jersey la.mhuqli 2010 kawas,wal rasun yaqah na gang. 2014 kawas,Aiello miru biru magal Simon ru Schuster. hiya laqi ga sakas ru squilq msibay , wal mhuqil yaqeh nbu 2010 kawas.sinbilan cinbwanan laqi Rick ,Jaime ru Stacey Aiello nya. hiya suna( Michael Kay )ga squilq ptkeke' prapa kmal maki New York Yankees tmucing mari
